department: Departement Public Works and government Service ( PSPC )
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 2 , 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This requirement is for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown owned portfolio in accordance with the Annex A Statement of Work. There is an optional teleconference associated with this requirement. The optional teleconference will be held on December 19th, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in English and also December 20th, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in French. Please confirm attendance for one of the two meetings.  Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than December 15th, 2023 at 14:00 EST to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.
full_summary:
### # Tender Announcement {: .header-txt} 
#### **W857A-24TR02 Responsive Maintenance Services for Canadian Forces Housing Agency {: #Proveedor} [EN][FR]**

[Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18183853?extsite=MTgxODM4NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Tender Information**
------------------------

**Bidding Title**: W857A-24TR02 Responsive Maintenance Services for Canadian Forces Housing Agency
**Solicitation Number**: WS4334248398
**Reference Number**: WS4334248398-Doc4338211938
**Publication Date**: December 4, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: February 2, 2024 (2:00 PM EST)

**Contract Overview**
---------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a request for proposals for the provision of cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio. The contract is expected to commence on April 1, 2024, and will conclude on March 31, 2026.

**Procurement Requirements**
---------------------------

*   The contractor shall provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio in accordance with the Annex A Statement of Work.
*   The optional teleconference will be held on December 19, 2023, at 1:00 PM EST in English and on December 20, 2023, at 1:00 PM EST in French. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than December 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

**Technical Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Technical Merit: 60%
*   Price: 40%

**Eligibility**
--------------

This tender opportunity is open to all qualified contractors.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact Martin Gauthier, PSPC, at +1 (819) XXX-XXXX or [martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Tender Documents**
---------------------

Please note that the tender documents can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery
